page.title: 18FERGUS HOUSE OLD FOLKS HOME
page.content:
{FERGUS HOUSE}was built in 1979 and opened in 1980. The average age of residents is about 85. Their main pastimes are watching television and snooker. The home has a minibus too take the old people on day trips. The old people always have their meals together. The home has ten staff to run it. They do all the cooking and many other things which are required in looking after old people.
{ There are other old folks homes or {sheltered housing schemes in Dyce. {These are Merrivale, Parkhill Court {and Berrymoss Court.
